channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
how do i up bounses on some items like d chain and stuff? becuas i want to lower some and rais some and how do i add commands please help
and how do i set items to stay

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

Oh, Open up NpcHandler.JAVA and Search:

Whatever the guy is saying already, or if you want someone to say

A new thing, follow this:

Search “moo”

then, you should see:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

Then after the last ‘}’ Paste:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 541) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Zeke's Super Shop!"; } }

‘541’ is the npc id, change that to whatever you want.

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Zeke's Super Shop!";

Is what the Npc says, Change ‘Zeke’s Super Shop!’ to what you want Your Npc To say.

Save+Compile ant there you go

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

To change bonuses Goto To Item.Cfg.
What it looks like:

item = 3140	Dragon_chainbody	A_series_of_connected_metal_rings.	100000000	100000000	100000000	29	39	29	-15	0	181	193	198	-3	182	30	30

What it means:

item = 3140	Dragon_chainbody	A_series_of_connected_metal_rings.	(price)	(price2)	(alch)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)	(bonus)

Adding commands, Use a Generator. and add under “master”

Idk what you mean by:

how do i set items to stay

Read full topic
